item.title: [Delta] Fix my pickup command. =( [Easy.]
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Change

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2)) {

to

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) {

There was an extra, unneeded “)”.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Fix my pickup command. =( [Easy.]
item.dc:creator: @N11 -N-
item.description:
@N11 wrote:

I have this –

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2)) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }

I compile and get this –

--- Compiling Bleach. --- client.java:7946: illegal start of expression if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2)) { ^ 1 error 'Compiling' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
